Title: We are heartbroken to report that Bilha Yinon (76), who has been missing si...
Description: We are heartbroken to report that Bilha Yinon (76), who has been missing since October 7th, has now been confirmed dead by the IDF. She and her husband, Yakov, were murdered in Moshav Netiv Ha?asara during the October 7th Hamas terrorist massacre, but her remains could only be identified now. Bilha was the last missing person from the massacre. May their memories forever be a blessing. ?

Title: IDF: *Exposed: A Hamas document from 2021 reveals the military involvement ...
Description: IDF: *Exposed: A Hamas document from 2021 reveals the military involvement of Ismail Al-Ghoul, the Nukhba terrorist who was also a journalist for Al Jazeera*As revealed last week (Thursday), Ismail Al-Ghoul, who was eliminated on Wednesday, 31/07/24, was a Hamas Nukhba terrorist who took part in the October 7th massacre and worked as a journalist for the Al Jazeera channel for the past few months.Revealed is a document from 2021, found on Hamas computers seized in the Gaza Strip, which details a list of thousands of the organization?s military wing operatives. The document revealed that as of 2021, Al-Ghoul was an engineer in the Hamas Gaza Brigade. Despite the deceitful attempts by Hamas and Al Jazeera to portray Al-Ghoul as a decent journalist, Al-Ghoul was an active Hamas terrorist.
